| internalname   = Gem_Emerald
| location       = * Can be gained during a scripted interaction in [Poko Kohara ruins](/pokoKoharaRuins/).
* Found in [Captain Henqua's Treasure](/captainHenquasTreasureMap/).  
* Two from [Tawenu](/tawenu/) in the quest [Coming to Terms](/comingToTerms/).
* [Undercroft](/undercroft/): Pickpocketed from a Renegade Watershaper (1x, could be random).
* [Queen's Berth](/queensBerth/): In a box next to [Luca](/luca/) in [Vailian Trading Company Headquarters](/vailianTradingCompanyHeadquarters/) (1x, could be random)
* [The Sacred Stair](/theSacredStair/): Pickpocketed from a Devotee of Magran, and the Bragging Orlan.
* [Drowned Barrows](/drownedBarrows/): Hidden stash in the barracks on the Crown floor. (3x, could be random)
* [Radiant Court](/radiantCourt/), [The Treasure Trove](/theTreasureTrove/): Sold by [Dimesa](/dimesa/) occasionally.
| guid           =9 a31f953-b8a8-4d9b-9de9-457ed3712963
}}
